metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Add oats and salt reduce heat

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • 1/2 cup flour • 1/4 cup olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). • Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. • Dredge chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs and grated Parmesan cheese. • Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. • Cook chicken until golden brown on both sides. • Place chicken in a baking dish, top with marinara ...

• • Add oats and salt, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. • Remove from heat and let sit for a few minutes. • Serve with your favorite toppings. • • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: In a bowl, combine the tuna, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. • • Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. • Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine. to taste • Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, poached egg Instructions: • Toast the bread slices. • Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper. • Spread the mashed avocado on the toast. • Add optional toppings if desired.
